meanings.sent1: The colorful fireworks display will delectate the children at the park.
meanings.sent2: I always delectate in the beauty of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics never fail to delectate us.
meanings.sent4: The sweet melody of the song delectated her senses.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies delectated everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: To enjoy or take pleasure in.
meanings.sent1: She would delectate in reading her favorite book by the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: We delectate in spending time together as a family.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to delectate in chasing after the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His eyes delectated in the sight of the beautiful garden.
meanings.sent5: The children delectated in the cool waters of the swimming pool.
